subject: Suits and Litigation
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Football
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: While IMG Worldwide was representing top college coaches, its chairman, Ted Forstmann, was betting hundreds of thousands of dollars on college football and basketball, according to a lawsuit.
snippet: While IMG Worldwide was representing top college coaches, its chairman, Ted Forstmann, was betting hundreds of thousands of dollars on college football and basketball, according to a lawsuit.
